Buying clothes online often feels like taking a big chance. I was afraid these pants would be low quality. But they're good quality. The material looks nice. It feels nice. The stitching is tight and the seams are strong. It's s pretty great!

评论概述: Beautiful but Size Down for the Black
评论详情: I’m 5’5” and 175. I just got these in black in an xl and am returning for a medium. I have a tummy so for me to have them be that much too big is a lot. Very stretchy in the waist, too much so for me. I love the look though and am, ordering down two sizes. Hope this helps.
Extremely comfortable pants. Lightweight yet warm enough to wear during the fall. I ordered a second pair I like them so much.

评论概述: The fabric is of two sorts

The length is good on my 5’6”frame, and looks good with Birkenstocks or ankle boots.  The pants are  light weight, apropos for spring summer and autumn, but with socks and tights, with a coatingan, you’ll be good in a Mediterranean type winter.

I don't know about you, but I want to eat my way through every country I visit while on vacation and so I bought these travel pants as insurance against too-tight waistbands if I gain a few lbs. They are flowing and uber comfortable! Pockets an extra bonus. The fabric is light and airy, and dries quickly. They wer PERFECT for my trip to high-humidy Vietnam. I like them so much, I might get another pair. And ~ they're really cute on. Nor can you beat the price for the quality.
These are good quality, very comfortable, and can work in casual and fancier situations. Good purchase.

Fits true to size. Stretch waistband.The material is light and soft on the skin. An elegant touch to a hot day, very flowy. Also good for a yoga workout although the pant leg will drop with gravity with high leg poses!
I realize they are supposed to be baggy, but a lot of material that has no shape
I could probably benefit from a size small, but medium is the smallest size and it works. I will likely get more colors in these as they are effortlessly gorgeous and comfortable as well.

I usually feel like wide-leg pants don't look good on me, but these are adorable! Light and airy, the fabric flows around my legs and looks fabulous. True to size, quality fabric, and well made. I'm going to buy another pair in a different color.

I have purchased these before , in white & continue to enjoy them ! Wearing a shirt over the waistband just made me look like absolutely formless. If I were 5'5" or taller, I'd love these.

I bought two pairs of these already and just ordered a third. They are fabulous. Comfortable and breezy. I like that they are lined but have a big slit on the sides of the top layer. It looks interesting and I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on them.

评论概述: Comfortable and good for warm temperatures

I purchased an extra large pair in brown but the color is more taupe leaning toward a gray to me. I'm not sure these are actually 100% cotton but to be safe I washed them on gentle in cold water and hung them to dry so they wouldn't shrink. I am 5'5" and they hit me right above the ankles. I have another pair in black. The pants are comfortable and great for travel, especially in warm climates.
Easy to wear + style up or down. It's has 2 layers, top is gauzy flowy but very comfortable to wear, length was slightly lower than mid calf. Would purchase again

评论概述: Makes a almost flat stomach look like a overhang belly
评论详情: The middle part where the front seems come together are not sewn down, which makes the belly area not lay flat and poof out and looks like the wearer has an over hang belly. And there are lose strings, and the cut on the seems are not straight. almost always I look great in anything with wide legs, and layers but this  pant is the wackiest thing, my legs look great, but I look like I have an apron belly! I am 5'7" curvy hourglass, so not a lot in the belly area. Sizing guide is on the small side, and yes I sized 2 sizes up. I did not wash it, because I have to return it.
Omg came bck for the white ones.. love love love.. will be ordering the last 2 colors to complete my wardrobe.. cant stop loving these yoga pants.. came early too.. just got in mail..

评论概述: Not linen, no stretch or give.
评论详情: I like the style of this pant, very flattering but the inside pant feels like plastic, has no stretch or give at all, can’t imagine exercising in any form in them. Shame too because I really liked them. I wear an xxl in everything else but these were snug on the inside. Should have been a fabric that gives and just a seam width wider in the legs. If longer I’d have worn them to church as well. But alas, I’m sending them back.
True to size, can be dressed up or down and super comfortable. I own two colors and may have to purchase more:)

TLDR - I am 5'4" and 170 lbs and preferred the more relaxed fit of the large vs the medium, particularly around my waist.  I have a hard rule about not purchasing clothes that require me to modify them (*looks at pile of clothes that I said I'd hem/adjust but never did*). However, I was in search of a pant option for my upcoming travel to hot, humid weather. These pants broke me, and I have no regrets. I didn't love that the inside pant leg was longer than the outside layer and because I opted for the Large, the legs were a tad too voluminous and billowy. I took to my sewing machine, chopped 5 inches off the inside layer and put a small stitch to the outside layers, just below the pocket, to smooth down the sides. They are now more like capris and I absolutely love them. The pants are now a 5 for me but I rated a 4 because it did require some work to get it just right.

Putting these in a low dryer for about 5 minutes and hanging them up took care of the wrinkles. Nice, lightweight fabric. But I'm not thrilled with the bulkiness of this pants design. Looks more like culottes. I ordered a taupe color, and I have no idea what type of top I'll wear with it. Tricky design for a short woman, I think. Have to experiment a bit.

Overall i like the Minibee Wide Leg pant. The fit is true to size and the length is perfect. My favorite part of the wide leg pant is the material that hangs over the pants which looks like a flowy skirt. It isn't that flattering but it is comfortable to wear especially in hot weather. I ordered a black and brown pair they are the same size, however, the black pair fits better than the brown the elastic waist on brown is tighter than the black. I do recommend them they can be dressed up or down. I am over 65 and think they are a fun and easy going.
not for me
I was very happy with these. I’m short and they were the perfect length for me. Waist is a great fit and the material is nice. I will be buying more!
These pants are light weight and stylish.  I love how the pants flow when I walk.  It has been washed and dried, and it did not shrink.

I would suggest ignoring the size Anazin suggests for you.  I started ordering a size larger and everything fits much better.These look great,  have comfortable elastic waistband, a soft gauzy over layer, and big roomy flowy legs.  They come down to just above my ankles( I'm 5'7").  These are kind of a taupe color.
The pants were not flattering on and I didn't like the wings or layered side pleats in the pants. I returned them.
I’m 5’3” and length is perfect. Nice and flowy. Comfortable.

Edit: I washed these pants on cold gentle and then I hung them to dry and the under pants shrunk several inches.  Also, the seams for the outer skirt are ripping! I have worn these for 3 days and only washed once! I love the shape, design and pockets but for $30, I need to get at least a season out of the garment!  I will not repurchase. I am 5,6 tall and weight 145. I have a 31 inch waist and got xl. Next time I am getting xxl because I fear shrinkage. Material seems like some sort of very wrinkly polyester. But there are pockets. These pants have a cool hippie vibe and I got a limited time deal. Very soft and I am getting the white but in xxl this time. Typically I am an 8 or 10 in old navy or Levi jeans. Also I have huge hips, glutes, thighs and carry weight in my legs.

评论概述: White makes me look very large!
评论详情: This style is likely very pretty on a slim person. But it makes a middle-age woman look like a big tub, especially if you like white.

评论概述: Lovely pants, the white is too sheer.
评论详情: I am 5'-1", 150 pounds, and I usually wear a size P12. I ordered white in size large and it fit me perfectly.  They are very light and flowing, and almost look like a long skirt. However, the white fabric is not opaque enough and the pockets could be easily seen under it (as well as underwear).  I suppose a solution for the white fabric would be to sew the pockets closed and cut them off, and then sew the outer fabric together down the side about 8 inches to add some coverage so panties don't show.  But I like pockets, so...I decided to return the white and order another pair in gray instead.
I ordered based off of the size chart and even got a size higher than what it said and they did not fit at all.
These pants are not only beautiful.. they are comfortable!! So many compliments and “where did you get them”. I purchased all colors !!!

评论概述: Lots of material at the waist.

评论概述: Sooooo comfy and a perfect fit!
评论详情: I put these pants on as soon as I opened them and i wore them to work - loves them!!!! They were PERFECT! Sizes down (I got a L)  and they were a great fit- length was perfect, too!  I am 4’11” and its hard to find things that DONT drag the ground! These were amazing in every way!!!  LOVE them!!!!
I am so pleased with these pants-dress them up or dress them down❤️❤️❤️❤️

I was a little skeptical on if I would like this or not, but after trying it on, it turned out to be one of my favorites. It’s nice and flowy, but very flattering fit, and has multiple layers so it’s not see through. I’m on the shorter end so it goes a little past my ankles, but that’s actually what I was hoping for.

Absolutely LOVE these!!! They flow like a skirt, super comfortable and not see-through due to the two layers of fabric! I love how chic they look and yet how easy they are to wear. Because of the material being silky and flowy, they look professional enough for the office. Plus, it's easy to dress them up with jewelry, a nice top and some healed sandals.
This was so very pretty! It washed and dried beautifully. However, size up because it runs small. I bought the white and love it !

评论概述: Soft and flowy and perfect for relaxed summer vacation
评论详情: These were soft, flowy and comfy pants. Fit nicely. Order up one size. I got the white and returned them as I couldn’t find anything to wear it with as all other whites in my entire closet clashed and even two tops I bought to wear with it. This is just under a bright white. And if you wear neutral toned underwear, it’s not see thru because of the double layer. Has nice pockets on inner layer. Going to buy the same pant in the same size but green color, if it’s still in stock.

These pants are the strangest style. I knew they had two layers, but I didn't realize that the top layer, which is gauze-like, is not sewn together down the outside of the legs. The inside seems are sewn together, but the outside seems flow freely, exposing the under layer, which is a cotton twill. I do like that these pants have pockets and they fit as expected. I just don't care for the design. Disappointed.

Love these ! I have two pair now . I recommend hand washing in cold water and hanging them to dry. There will be no shrinkage.

At first I thought they were too short but the under layer makes it longer.  With the right shoes will make the look better.  Love the style that updates my wardrobe.  Contemplating getting another color.
Super comfy and cute. They wash well.

I have bought several of these in M but wanted a gray pair, I ordered L to check out the difference. They are so beautiful but this pair, the gray ones, has an issue with color. Some light (dim) they do look a bit gray but for the most part, lavender/purple. But really beautiful. The waistband of the L is comfy for a 28"-30" waist. I have mediums that are a bit more snug. The L is ankle length on me I'm 5'2" with a 31" leg inseam. Mediums are well above my ankle.  Not sure if this color is a glitch in manufacture or if it is meant to be this way. I'll wear them but hopefully, will find a top that matches besides white or black. I've washed all of them but hung dry, no dryer. Also, the pockets are a big plus for me. I love the fluid design.
Absolutely Love these!! Height 5'1 Weight 144lbs. They are Comfortable and Love the Style!
